channel.title: TOR:IVN on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in TOR:IVN on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Qatar’s QIA Takes $500 Million Stake in Copper Miner Ivanhoe
item.description: Qatar’s sovereign wealth fund will acquire a $500 million stake in copper producer Ivanhoe Mines Ltd., deepening its push into the global mining industry.

item.title: Qatar’s QIA Takes $500 Million Stake in Copper Miner Ivanhoe
item.description: Qatar’s sovereign wealth fund will acquire a $500 million stake in copper producer Ivanhoe Mines Ltd., deepening its push into the global mining industry.

item.title: Qatar’s Wealth Fund Nears Deal for Minority Stake in Ivanhoe
item.description: Qatar’s $524 billion sovereign wealth fund is nearing a deal to buy a minority stake in Canada’s Ivanhoe Mines Ltd., according to people familiar with the matter.

item.title: Qatar’s Wealth Fund Nears Deal for Minority Stake in Ivanhoe
item.description: Qatar’s $524 billion sovereign wealth fund is nearing a deal to buy a minority stake in Canada’s Ivanhoe Mines Ltd., according to people familiar with the matter.
